sn38:1.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake.
sn38:1.1.2: Atha kho jambukhādako paribbājako yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn38:1.1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jambukhādako paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn38:1.2.5: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:1.2.6: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:1.2.7: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:1.2.8: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:1.2.9: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
sn38:1.2.10: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:1.2.11: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā etassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
sn38:2.1.5: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:2.1.6: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:2.1.7: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:2.1.8: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:2.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo, ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:2.1.11: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyāya.
sn38:3.1.1: “Ke nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, loke dhammavādino, ke loke suppaṭipannā, ke loke sugatā”ti?
sn38:3.1.2: “Ye kho, āvuso, rāgappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti, dosappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti, mohappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti, te loke dhammavādino.
sn38:3.1.3: Ye kho, āvuso, rāgassa pahānāya paṭipannā, dosassa pahānāya paṭipannā, mohassa pahānāya paṭipannā, te loke suppaṭipannā.
sn38:3.1.4: Yesaṃ kho, āvuso, rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, doso pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, moho pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, te loke sugatā”ti.
sn38:3.2.1: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:3.2.2: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:3.2.3: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:3.2.4: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:3.2.6: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:3.2.7: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa pahānāya.
sn38:4.1.1: “Kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
sn38:4.1.2: “Dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
sn38:4.1.3: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:4.1.4: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:4.1.5: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:4.2.1: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:4.2.3: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:4.2.4: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya.
sn38:5.1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, assāsappatto hotī”ti?
sn38:5.1.3: “Yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ettāvatā kho, āvuso, assāsappatto hotī”ti.
sn38:5.1.4: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:5.1.5: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:5.1.6: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:5.1.7: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:5.1.9: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:5.1.10: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa assāsassa sacchikiriyāya.
sn38:6.1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, paramassāsappatto hotī”ti?
sn38:6.1.3: “Yato kho, āvuso, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti, ettāvatā kho, āvuso, paramassāsappatto hotī”ti.
sn38:6.1.4: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:6.1.5: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:6.1.6: “Katamo pana, āvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti?
sn38:6.1.7: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:6.1.9: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
sn38:6.1.10: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa paramassāsassa sacchikiriyāya.
sn38:7.1.5: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn38:7.1.7: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:7.1.8: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:7.1.9: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:7.1.10: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:7.1.12: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:7.1.13: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāya.
sn38:8.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:8.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:8.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:8.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:8.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:8.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etesaṃ āsavānaṃ pahānāya.
sn38:9.1.3: “Yaṃ kho, āvuso, dukkhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇaṃ—
sn38:9.1.5: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:9.1.6: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:9.1.7: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:9.1.8: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etissā avijjāya pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:9.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:9.1.11: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etissā avijjāya pahānāya.
sn38:10.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:10.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:10.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:10.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:10.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:10.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ taṇhānaṃ pahānāya.
sn38:11.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:11.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:11.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:11.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:11.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:11.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etesaṃ oghānaṃ pahānāya.
sn38:12.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:12.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:12.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāyā”ti?
sn38:12.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:12.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāyā”ti.
sn38:12.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etesaṃ upādānānaṃ pahānāya.
sn38:13.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:13.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:13.1.8: “Katamo, panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:13.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:13.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:13.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etesaṃ bhavānaṃ pariññāya.
sn38:14.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:14.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:14.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:14.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:14.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:14.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ dukkhatānaṃ pariññāya.
sn38:15.1.3: “Pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā sakkāyo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:15.1.5: Ime kho, āvuso, pañcupādānakkhandhā sakkāyo vutto bhagavatā”ti.
sn38:15.1.6: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:15.1.7: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:15.1.8: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38:15.1.9: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38:15.1.11: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38:15.1.12: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa sakkāyassa pariññāya.
sn38:16.1.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkaran”ti?
